rev.comment: thats not a distro, removing external link
rev.diff:
Line 33: Line 33:
Libdvdcss alone is only a [[Software library|library]] and can not play DVDs. DVD player applications, such as [[VLC Media Player]], link to this library to decode DVDs. Libdvdcss is optional in many open-source DVD players, but without it, only non-encrypted discs will play.
Libdvdcss alone is only a [[Software library|library]] and can not play DVDs. DVD player applications, such as [[VLC Media Player]], link to this library to decode DVDs. Libdvdcss is optional in many open-source DVD players, but without it, only non-encrypted discs will play.
â
Distributions which come pre-installed with libdvdcss include [[BackTrack]], [[CrunchBang Linux]], [[LinuxMCE]], [[Linux Mint]], [[PCLinuxOS]], [[Puppy Linux|Puppy Linux 4.2.1]], [[Recovery Is Possible]], [[Slax]], [[Super OS]],[http://drm-removal.net/drm-converter.html drm converter], [[Pardus (operating system)|Pardus]] and [[XBMC Live]].
+
Distributions which come pre-installed with libdvdcss include [[BackTrack]], [[CrunchBang Linux]], [[LinuxMCE]], [[Linux Mint]], [[PCLinuxOS]], [[Puppy Linux|Puppy Linux 4.2.1]], [[Recovery Is Possible]], [[Slax]], [[Super OS]], [[Pardus (operating system)|Pardus]] and [[XBMC Live]].
